feature.label: NCL Eclipse
feature.description: This feature provides NCL Eclipse. NCL Eclipse is a plug-in to support NCL development in Eclipse. NCL Eclipse can help authors with autocomplete, marking error and many other facilities. Additionally, this feature also provides the NCL Club integration that helps the users browsing and downloading NCL applications examples from the NCL Club repository.
